DOC.brief_summary: The FANTOM I pilot study intend assess safety Fantom Bioresorbable Coronary Scaffold native coronary artery .
DOC.brief_title: Pilot Study Fantom Bioresorbable Scaffold ( FANTOM I )
DOC.criteria: Patient evidence myocardial ischemia positive functional study Patient normal CKMB Target lesion visually estimate stenosis ≥50 % < 100 % Target lesion locate native coronary artery average reference vessel diameter ≥ 2.7mm ≤ 3.3mm Target lesion length must ≤ 14mm Patient experience myocardial infarction ( CKMB Troponin > 5 X ULN ) within 72 hour procedure Patient leave ventricular ejection fraction < 25 % Patient unprotected l main coronary disease ≥50 % stenosis The target vessel totally occlude ( TIMI Flow 0 1 ) Target lesion involve bifurcation ( lesion side branch ≥ 2.0 mm diameter contain ≥ 50 % stenosis ) . Target lesion locate within bypass graft Target lesion possible definite thrombus
